page.title: 01Introducing Morchard Bishop
page.content: This block -Grid Reference 02760105-is situated near the centre of Devon,away from any large town or main route.It includes the village of Morchard Bishop,lying along and to the North of a small ridge at over 500ft.,with undulating farmland to the south and east.The village itself occupies less than one square kilometre which centres around a triangular area called the Green.Fifteen farms and three hamlets are scattered over the rest of the area .Some are only accessible by very narrow lanes.There are many springs and streams and mainly hedged pasture fields and small areas of woodland in the valleys.The main occupation is dairy farming.
